@dev Withdraw all the ethers of contract to owner

ERC20Minted(address,uint256).details: Event generated when ERC20 tokens are minted

EthersWithdraw(address).details: Event generated when owner withdraw the ethers

TokenPriceUpdated(uint256).details: Event generated when owner update the token price.
